MessageSent(bytes).details: Relayers watch for these events to construct merkle proofs to execute transactions on Gnosis Chain.

params.epoch: The epoch of the batch requested to send.
params.stateRoot: The receiving domain encoded message data.

StaterootSent(uint64,bytes32).details: The event is emitted when messages are sent through the canonical arbiturm bridge.

params.epoch: The epoch of the batch requested to send.
params.stateRoot: The state root of batched messages.

saveStateRootSnapshot().details: Snapshots can be saved a maximum of once per epoch.

sendMsg(address,bytes).details: Sends an arbitrary message to a receiving chain.

params.to: The address of the contract on the receiving chain which receives the calldata.

sendStaterootSnapshot(uint64).details: Sends the state root using Arbitrum's canonical bridge.

params.epochSend: The epoch of the batch requested to send.

SnapshotSaved(uint64,bytes32).notice: The bridgers need to watch for these events and relay the stateRoot on the veaOutbox.
